{% endraw %}

Install

Pip

pip install sorarepy

Conda

conda install sorarepy

Login

To receieve your JWT and team name slug.

l = LoginSorare(app_name="test_app", email="abc@gmail.com", password="abc", two_factor="12345")
token, club_name = l.login()
